thread.title: Hillary Clinton kills it in instant classic 'SNL' sketch
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton kills it in instant classic 'SNL' sketch | www.kirotv.com

author: Douglas Barclay
title: Hillary Clinton kills it in instant classic 'SNL' sketch
text:
During the season premiere of “Saturday Night Live” former Secretary of State and Democratic presidential hopeful Hillary Rodham Clinton showed to look her doppelganger right in the face and engage in a hilarious sketch.
After Kate McKinnon’s Clinton showed up at a late-night bar, she orders a stiff drink from her friendly bartender Val.
Val, played by the real Clinton, breaks down Clinton’s political career, and referenced many of the common criticisms of Hillary.
“I’m just an ordinary citizen who believes the Keystone Pipeline will destroy our environment,” Val tells Clinton, while smiling at the audience.
>> Read more trending stories
When McKinnon’s Clinton brings up that she has often taken her time to come to the right decision, Val gives Clinton some advice that the real Clinton hopes American voters take.
“Nothing wrong with taking your time, as long as you get it right,” Val jokes.
When Republican Presidential hopeful Donald Trump came up, Val gave her best Trump impression, capturing what would be the biggest laugh of the night.
“I wish you could be President!” McKinnon’s Clinton told Clinton’s Val, after hearing her advice.
“Me too!” the real Clinton responded.
